subject: FW: Urgent - Issue with RLCD videos

full_threads.body: Heath Maguire Joel Maligalig Morning guys, just saw all the messages now...let me know if you need anything from my side. Cheers

Thanks



Petricia Augustus


Head of Communications, Marketing and Operations


MS Research Australia


02 8413 7910 • 1300 356 467

Level 19 Northpoint • 100 Miller Street • North Sydney NSW 2060

Hi Trish,


Sure we will let you know once done.


Thanks,
Joel Maligalig can you please action the request to make the boxes all the same height and then reply to Trish to let her know it’s done? Thanks

All fixed – however Heath is there any way we can make all of the boxes the same height?


Thanks


Trish

Hi Tanja,


I have told Trish how to fix and she is saving the day as we speak.


Thanks,
All good, the long URL works, they are updating them now! Joao Henriques Joel Maligalig
This is an example of a long link for the Curtin video: https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=ylA1M-lqquw

Hi Tanja and Trish,


Can you confirm that the videos are set to public and perhaps try to embed them with the long URL provided from YouTube?


We are also looking into it from our end, it’s something to do with the link itself as it worked fine with other videos as previously demonstrated. Thanks,

FYI

Petricia Augustus

From: Tanja Voss
Sent: Tuesday, 1 May 2018 8:23 AM
To: heath@wolfiq.com.au
Cc: Angela Egerton-Warburton <AEgertonWarburton@msra.org.au>; Petricia Augustus <paugustus@msra.org.au>
Subject: RE: Urgent - Issue with RLCD videos
Importance: High

Hi Heath,

I just tried uploading an image to the videos for the meantime, but that isn’t working either.

Can you please look into this as soon as possible?

I’m really worried we’re losing people who are clicking on the link.

Thank you,

Tanja

From: Tanja Voss
Sent: Tuesday, 1 May 2018 7:54 AM
To: heath@wolfiq.com.au
Cc: Petricia Augustus <paugustus@msra.org.au>; Angela.Kehoe@nbcf.org.au
Subject: Urgent - Issue with RLCD videos

Good morning Heath,

Can you please look into the below first thing this morning? The videos are meant to

show a preview on the page, and not just a link.

We are already promoting this page on all our social channels, so can you please look into this asap?

Thanks so much,

Tanja

Sent from my iPhone


Begin forwarded message:

From: Petricia Augustus <paugustus@msra.org.au>
Date: 1. May 2018 at 07:19:19 GMT+10
To: Tanja Voss <tvoss@msra.org.au>, Angela Egerton-Warburton <AEgertonWarburton@msra.org.au>
Subject: Battle of the labs

Hi Ladies

I think the videos are amazing on the battle of the labs, just watched them all. However I am not sure if this is what is meant to happen but the videos are not being embedded onto the page – it’s just a link. See image below. Is this correct??

Thanks

Trish
